# AWS Test Secrets (FAKE - for testing only)
# These are example patterns that match AWS key formats but are NOT real credentials

# SEC001: AWS Access Key (standalone)
AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE

# SEC001: AWS Access Key (in config)
aws_access_key_id = AKIAI44QH8DHBEXAMPLE

# SEC002: AWS Secret Key
aws_secret_access_key = 'wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY'
aws_secret_access_key = "abcdefghijABCDEFGHIJ0123456789+/EXAMPLE="

# Edge cases (should NOT match)
# Too short access key
AKIA123

# Not starting with AKIA
BKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE

# Lowercase (access keys are uppercase)
akiaiosfodnn7example
